sub_title: Food Scientist & Innovator │ Consumer Research │ Product Development │ Market Research │ Food Regulatory - Helping food businesses develop healthy and sustainable products
summary:
Do you want to develop new products? Are you looking for a food innovation specialist? My name is Šárka Vrchotová and I develop food products that have a global impact via their health aspect and sustainability. As an innovation specialist, I integrate key domains necessary for product development. I am able to perform and translate scientific biomedical and consumer data into new ideas that are both beneficial to consumers as well as economically attractive.

In my private time I enjoy dancing, piano playing, skating, swimming, travelling, learning languages and working on DIY home projects.

2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Hellema-Hallum B.V.', 'description': "Planned and executed consumer research at Hellema Hallum company in collaboration with Maastricht University to determine potential demand for Dutch parents to have healthier snacks for their children.

• Exploratory quantitative research among Dutch parents (online survey)
• Consumer behaviour (eating habits, food/ingredients' preferences) of Dutch parents investigated
• Successfully helped Hellema company to gain insights in:
    - children snacking behaviour in the Netherlands
    - parents' preference for a healthier snack option for their children 
    - children's food preferences of healthy compounds
• Increased company awareness regarding eating patterns among children, dietary guidelines and product recommendations
• Recommendations and strategy for future research and snack development targetted at children", 'title': 'Research Intern', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': 603895, 'name': 'InterUM, Maastricht University employment agency', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQGmVIXe0ek6tg/company-logo_400_400/0/1673518071083?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=qbrGnfpiePmYBQff3DIxaFhqXWCKSu3VhZQnXNboWRY', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/interum-studentjobs/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Maastricht a okolí, Nizozemsko', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'InterUM, Maastricht University employment agency', 'description': 'Promotion of my study programme to prospective students and share my personal and professional experience about student life at the faculty. 

• Shared knowledge and insight on the professional and personal side about the programme which is presented during open days and other activities (student for a day)
• Clear explanation of the used learning methods', 'title': 'Student Ambassador', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'University of South Bohemia ', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Budejovice, South Bohemia, Czechia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'University of South Bohemia ', 'description': 'Research of the current levels of dietary quality and nutritional style of toddlers (age 1-3 years old). Results showed average salt and macronutrient (carbohydrates, fats, proteins) consumption by 50 toddlers.
• ISBN: 978-80-7394-691-3', 'title': 'Data Scientist & Editor', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Academy of Sciences Conference Centre', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Nové Hrady, South Bohemia, Czechia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'Academy of Sciences Conference Centre', 'description': 'Assessment of titanium manufacturing materials used for the production of orthopaedic and dental implants. 

• The aim of this project was to determine how materials affect cell adhesion and growth in vitro. For this, we investigated biocompatibility between the implanted material (TiGr2, CrCoTi) and human tissue (HeLa cells) in vitro and performed cytotoxicity of materials.
• We also used a new technological procedure called colonization for this research which enabled:
   - interaction between the surface of living cells and the test material
   - preserve an image of the interaction', 'title': 'Laboratory Researcher', 'employment_type': None}]}]
